data.name: searchNotSavedAlertBody
data.value: The search must contain at least one input in order to be saved

data.name: dateErrorWrongFormatBody
data.value: the date entered is not of the format dd.mm.yyyy, please correct it before proceeding

data.name: dateErrorInPastBody
data.value: The date entered is in the past, please correct it before proceeding

data.name: dateErrorHasCharactersBody
data.value: The date entered contains letters, please correct it before proceeding

data.name: dateErrorMoreThanFiveYearsBody
data.value: The day can be a value between 1 and 31, months between 1 and 12 while year not more than 5 years time from now, please correct it before proceeding

data.name: dateErrorGeneralBody
data.value: The day can be a value between 1 and 31, months between 1 and 12 while year not more than 5 years time from now, please correct it before proceeding

data.value: Add Selected Tags to my liked Tags

data.value: Show matches with my liked Tags

data.name: NoBookedEventsFirstLine
data.value: Sorry, but you have not booked any events yet.

data.name: NoBookedEventsSecondLine
data.value: You can book events easily by clicking on the Book Now button in the Event Description screen.

data.name: tagCaptured
data.value: has been saved and you will recieve suggestions based on that. What else are you interested in ?

data.name: noTagCaptured
data.value: You can enter Tags by saying (Interested in), (love) or (like) followed by the topic that interests you

data.name: iAmFine
data.value: I am fine, thanks for asking

data.name: NoSearchesFirstLine
data.value: Sorry, but you have not saved any searches yet.

data.name: NoSearchesSecondLine
data.value: You can save searches by toggling the Save Search option on in the search for event screen

data.name: NoEventsFirstLine
data.value: Sorry, but you have not saved any events yet.

data.name: NoEventsSecondLine
data.value: You can save events by tapping the heart icon in the bottom right of event's description
